description: Integrate with Sitespeakai to leverage AI-powered chatbots and enhance user interactions on your website.

actions.name: create_finetune
actions.description: Adds a new fine-tune (question + suggested answer) for the specified chatbot in SiteSpeakAI.

actions.name: delete_finetune
actions.description: Deletes a fine-tune entry from the selected chatbot.

actions.name: sendQuery
actions.description: Sends a query to the specified chatbot and retrieves a response.

triggers.name: newLead
triggers.description: Triggers when a new lead with an email address is created in SiteSpeakAI.
